parameters.name: url
parameters.description: A database url of the form jdbc:subprotocol:subname.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The database user on whose behalf the connection is being made.

parameters.name: driver
parameters.description: The driver to be used, for example org.h2.Driver.

parameters.name: append
parameters.description: Append the result to the data packet; otherwise the result is ignored.

parameters.name: separate
parameters.description: If a select query is used and multiple result rows are given, either make a datum for each row (true) or concatenate all rows as a list in the datum (false).

parameters.name: distinct
parameters.description: Only execute distinct queries within each DataPacket once, and reuse results if append is true.

parameters.name: manipulate_data
parameters.description: Executes the given SQL statement, which may be an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement or an SQL statement that returns nothing, such as an SQL DDL statement.
